summary: In this Japanese name, the family name is Yokoi.
full_text: Gunpei Yokoi , sometimes transliterated Gumpei Yokoi, was a Japanese video game designer. He was a long-time Nintendo employee, best known as creator of the Game Boy and Game & Watch handheld systems, inventor of the modern-day D-pad or 'cross' pad , and producer of a few long-running and critically acclaimed video game franchises.
title: Gunpei Yokoi
